LanguageData.VAERoy_PsychicSensitivity.label: nuzzled by a peacock
LanguageData.VAERoy_PsychicSensitivity.description: The royal peacock nuzzled me. I can feel a psychic energy flowing through my body.
LanguageData.VAERoy_AngoraRabbitBonded.label: angora rabbit bonded
LanguageData.VAERoy_AngoraRabbitBonded.description: This angora rabbit has bonded with a colonist. It will provide a psychic connection to that colonist increasing psychic entropy recovery rate, but the rabbit will die if the bonded colonist dies.
LanguageData.VAERoy_AngoraRabbitBondedPawn.label: angora bond
LanguageData.VAERoy_AngoraRabbitBondedPawn.descriptio: Psychic connection with an angora rabbit that helps with neural heat dissipation.
LanguageData.VAERoy_PsychicInvisibility.label: psychic invisibility
LanguageData.VAERoy_PsychicInvisibility.description: Psychically-induced invisibility. This actually affects others nearby, making their brains unable to perceive the sight of this individual, even if the eyes are unaffected.
